trends: There have been no other sightings in Hartbeespoort
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson saturday the 11 january i was on top of the mountain taking a panorama photos of hartebeespoort dam. the whole sequence of 15 photos took less than 30 seconds to take. when i got back to process the photos after stitching together i noticed a black spot in the sky. i then looked closeup at the individual shots and this spot only appeared in the 1 frame. the photo with the spot was taken at 14:23:58 seconds the very next photo of the same area was taken at 14:23:59 seconds. the object was gone. looking at the distance and the size of the object it would appear to be much larger than a car almost the size of a small house. there were no planes, helicopters or microlights. i could not have been birds because i was shooting at infinity so a bird that size would have been much closer and blurred. the object is clear. i was shooting at shutter speed 1250. i also believe that if it were birds i would have captured them in multiple frames. the next day i tested to see if it was a plane or helicopter. i would have captured them in multiple frames. it only appeared for 1 second. friends suggested that it may have been a meteor. possible but a meteor that size would be heard and devastation \ explosion would follow.
